description:
Tasty bar with an almond butter base, mixed with strawberries, blueberries, and other good-for-you ingredients. 100% vegan and trans-fat free.

  • Low glycemic index grain sweeteners
  • Ingredients: brown rice syrup, oats, dates, sunflower seeds, cashew butter (cashews, sunflower oil), almond butter (almonds), cashews, raisins, flax seeds, sesame seeds, almonds, apple juice concentrate, dried cane syrup, strawberries, blueberries, crisp brown rice, expeller pressed canola oil, chocolate liquor drops, vegetable glycerin, blueberry puree, dried pineapple, dried cane syrup, dried papaya, oat flour, pumpkin seeds, molasses, citric acid, natural flavour, sunflower oil, blueberry flavour, salt
  • Allergens, contains: almonds, cashews, oats, sesame
name: Probar Whole Berry Blast (Meal)
